introSection.heading3: I enjoy crafting fast, scalable systems with clean code and a bit of chaos.
introSection.heading4: Lover of cloud tech, backend logic, and the occasional frontend polish.
introSection.heading5: Exploring new stacks, optimizing old ones.
introSection.heading6: Shipping projects faster than my coffee gets cold.
introSection.heading7: Currently chasing bugs, dreams, and dopamine hits from passing test cases.
introSection.heading8: Sometimes I tweet, sometimes I deploy at 2am.
